// 6. Integrated Model with Geospatial Map 

defineNode(DZ_1_1_1, des);
{defineState(Discrete, HotZone, ColdZone);
p( DZ_1_1_1 ) = { HotZone: 0.5; ColdZone: 0.5; } 
}
 
defineNode(DZ_2_1_1, des);
{defineState(Discrete, HotZone, ColdZone);
p( DZ_2_1_1 | DZ_1_1_1)
=     if (DZ_1_1_1 == HotZone )
{ HotZone: 0.8; ColdZone: 0.2; }
else if (DZ_1_1_1 == ColdZone )
{ HotZone: 0.2; ColdZone: 0.8; }
}
 
defineNode(DZ_3_1_1, des);
{defineState(Discrete, HotZone, ColdZone);
p( DZ_3_1_1 | DZ_2_1_1)
=     if (DZ_2_1_1 == HotZone )
{ HotZone: 0.8; ColdZone: 0.2; }
else if (DZ_2_1_1 == ColdZone )
{ HotZone: 0.2; ColdZone: 0.8; }
}
 
defineNode(DZ_4_1_1, des);
{defineState(Discrete, HotZone, ColdZone);
p( DZ_4_1_1 | DZ_3_1_1)
=     if (DZ_3_1_1 == HotZone )
{ HotZone: 0.8; ColdZone: 0.2; }
else if (DZ_3_1_1 == ColdZone )
{ HotZone: 0.2; ColdZone: 0.8; }
}
 
defineNode(DZ_5_1_1, des);
{defineState(Discrete, HotZone, ColdZone);
p( DZ_5_1_1 | DZ_4_1_1)
=     if (DZ_4_1_1 == HotZone )
{ HotZone: 0.8; ColdZone: 0.2; }
else if (DZ_4_1_1 == ColdZone )
{ HotZone: 0.2; ColdZone: 0.8; }
}
 
defineNode(Regional_Spread_Rate_1_1, des);
{defineState(Discrete, High, Low);
p(Regional_Spread_Rate_1_1 ) = { High: 0.5; Low: 0.5; } 
}
 
defineNode(DZ_6_1_1, des);
{defineState(Discrete, HotZone, ColdZone);
p( DZ_6_1_1 | DZ_5_1_1, Regional_Spread_Rate_1_1)
=     if (DZ_5_1_1 == HotZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_1_1 == High )
{ HotZone: 0.8; ColdZone: 0.2; }
else if (DZ_5_1_1 == ColdZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_1_1 == High )
{ HotZone: 0.2; ColdZone: 0.8; }
else if (DZ_5_1_1 == HotZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_1_1 == Low )
{ HotZone: 0.6; ColdZone: 0.4; }
else if (DZ_5_1_1 == ColdZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_1_1 == Low )
{ HotZone: 0.4; ColdZone: 0.6; }
}
 
defineNode(Regional_Spread_Rate_1_2, des);
{defineState(Discrete, High, Low);
p(Regional_Spread_Rate_1_2 ) = { High: 0.5; Low: 0.5; } 
}
 
defineNode(DZ_6_1_2, des);
{defineState(Discrete, HotZone, ColdZone);
p( DZ_6_1_2 | DZ_5_1_1, DZ_5_1_2, Regional_Spread_Rate_1_2)
=     if (DZ_5_1_1 == HotZone && DZ_5_1_2 == HotZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_1_2 == High )
{ HotZone: 0.8; ColdZone: 0.2; }
else if (DZ_5_1_1 == HotZone && DZ_5_1_2 == ColdZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_1_2 == High )
{ HotZone: 0.5; ColdZone: 0.5; }
else if (DZ_5_1_1 == ColdZone && DZ_5_1_2 == HotZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_1_2 == High )
{ HotZone: 0.5; ColdZone: 0.5; }
else if (DZ_5_1_1 == ColdZone && DZ_5_1_2 == ColdZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_1_2 == High )
{ HotZone: 0.2; ColdZone: 0.8; }
else if (DZ_5_1_1 == HotZone && DZ_5_1_2 == HotZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_1_2 == Low )
{ HotZone: 0.6; ColdZone: 0.4; }
else if (DZ_5_1_1 == HotZone && DZ_5_1_2 == ColdZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_1_2 == Low )
{ HotZone: 0.5; ColdZone: 0.5; }
else if (DZ_5_1_1 == ColdZone && DZ_5_1_2 == HotZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_1_2 == Low )
{ HotZone: 0.5; ColdZone: 0.5; }
else if (DZ_5_1_1 == ColdZone && DZ_5_1_2 == ColdZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_1_2 == Low )
{ HotZone: 0.4; ColdZone: 0.6; }
}

=     if (DZ_3_1_3 == HotZone && DZ_3_2_3 == HotZone )

else if (DZ_3_1_3 == ColdZone && DZ_3_2_3 == HotZone )
{ HotZone: 0.5; ColdZone: 0.5; }
else if (DZ_3_1_3 == ColdZone && DZ_3_2_3 == ColdZone )
{ HotZone: 0.2; ColdZone: 0.8; }
}

{defineState(Discrete, HotZone, ColdZone);
p( DZ_6_4_6 | DZ_5_3_5, DZ_5_4_5, Regional_Spread_Rate_4_6)
=     if (DZ_5_3_5 == HotZone && DZ_5_4_5 == HotZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_4_6 == High )
{ HotZone: 0.8; ColdZone: 0.2; }
else if (DZ_5_3_5 == HotZone && DZ_5_4_5 == ColdZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_4_6 == High )
{ HotZone: 0.5; ColdZone: 0.5; }
else if (DZ_5_3_5 == ColdZone && DZ_5_4_5 == HotZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_4_6 == High )
{ HotZone: 0.5; ColdZone: 0.5; }
else if (DZ_5_3_5 == ColdZone && DZ_5_4_5 == ColdZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_4_6 == High )
{ HotZone: 0.2; ColdZone: 0.8; }
else if (DZ_5_3_5 == HotZone && DZ_5_4_5 == HotZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_4_6 == Low )
{ HotZone: 0.6; ColdZone: 0.4; }
else if (DZ_5_3_5 == HotZone && DZ_5_4_5 == ColdZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_4_6 == Low )
{ HotZone: 0.5; ColdZone: 0.5; }
else if (DZ_5_3_5 == ColdZone && DZ_5_4_5 == HotZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_4_6 == Low )
{ HotZone: 0.5; ColdZone: 0.5; }
else if (DZ_5_3_5 == ColdZone && DZ_5_4_5 == ColdZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_4_6 == Low )
{ HotZone: 0.4; ColdZone: 0.6; }
}

defineNode(DZ_6_6_1, des);
{defineState(Discrete, HotZone, ColdZone);
p( DZ_6_6_1 | DZ_5_5_1, Regional_Spread_Rate_6_1)
=     if (DZ_5_5_1 == HotZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_6_1 == High )
{ HotZone: 0.8; ColdZone: 0.2; }

defineNode(DZ_5_5_4, des);
{defineState(Discrete, HotZone, ColdZone);
p( DZ_5_5_4 | DZ_4_4_3, DZ_4_4_4)
=     if (DZ_4_4_3 == HotZone && DZ_4_4_4 == HotZone )
{ HotZone: 0.8; ColdZone: 0.2; }
else if (DZ_4_4_3 == HotZone && DZ_4_4_4 == ColdZone )
{ HotZone: 0.5; ColdZone: 0.5; }
else if (DZ_4_4_3 == ColdZone && DZ_4_4_4 == HotZone )
{ HotZone: 0.5; ColdZone: 0.5; }
else if (DZ_4_4_3 == ColdZone && DZ_4_4_4 == ColdZone )
{ HotZone: 0.2; ColdZone: 0.8; }
}

defineNode(DZ_6_6_5, des);
{defineState(Discrete, HotZone, ColdZone);
p( DZ_6_6_5 | DZ_5_5_4, DZ_5_5_5, Regional_Spread_Rate_6_5)
=     if (DZ_5_5_4 == HotZone && DZ_5_5_5 == HotZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_6_5 == High )
{ HotZone: 0.8; ColdZone: 0.2; }
else if (DZ_5_5_4 == HotZone && DZ_5_5_5 == ColdZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_6_5 == High )
{ HotZone: 0.5; ColdZone: 0.5; }
else if (DZ_5_5_4 == ColdZone && DZ_5_5_5 == HotZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_6_5 == High )
{ HotZone: 0.5; ColdZone: 0.5; }
else if (DZ_5_5_4 == ColdZone && DZ_5_5_5 == ColdZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_6_5 == High )
{ HotZone: 0.2; ColdZone: 0.8; }
else if (DZ_5_5_4 == HotZone && DZ_5_5_5 == HotZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_6_5 == Low )
{ HotZone: 0.6; ColdZone: 0.4; }
else if (DZ_5_5_4 == HotZone && DZ_5_5_5 == ColdZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_6_5 == Low )
{ HotZone: 0.5; ColdZone: 0.5; }
else if (DZ_5_5_4 == ColdZone && DZ_5_5_5 == HotZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_6_5 == Low )
{ HotZone: 0.5; ColdZone: 0.5; }
else if (DZ_5_5_4 == ColdZone && DZ_5_5_5 == ColdZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_6_5 == Low )
{ HotZone: 0.4; ColdZone: 0.6; }
}

defineNode(DZ_3_3_3, des);
{defineState(Discrete, HotZone, ColdZone);
p( DZ_3_3_3 | DZ_2_2_2)
=     if (DZ_2_2_2 == HotZone )
{ HotZone: 0.8; ColdZone: 0.2; }
else if (DZ_2_2_2 == ColdZone )
{ HotZone: 0.2; ColdZone: 0.8; }
}

defineNode(DZ_6_5_6, des);
{defineState(Discrete, HotZone, ColdZone);
p( DZ_6_5_6 | DZ_5_4_5, DZ_5_5_5, Regional_Spread_Rate_5_6)
=     if (DZ_5_4_5 == HotZone && DZ_5_5_5 == HotZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_5_6 == High )
{ HotZone: 0.8; ColdZone: 0.2; }
else if (DZ_5_4_5 == HotZone && DZ_5_5_5 == ColdZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_5_6 == High )
{ HotZone: 0.5; ColdZone: 0.5; }
else if (DZ_5_4_5 == ColdZone && DZ_5_5_5 == HotZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_5_6 == High )
{ HotZone: 0.5; ColdZone: 0.5; }
else if (DZ_5_4_5 == ColdZone && DZ_5_5_5 == ColdZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_5_6 == High )
{ HotZone: 0.2; ColdZone: 0.8; }
else if (DZ_5_4_5 == HotZone && DZ_5_5_5 == HotZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_5_6 == Low )
{ HotZone: 0.6; ColdZone: 0.4; }
else if (DZ_5_4_5 == HotZone && DZ_5_5_5 == ColdZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_5_6 == Low )
{ HotZone: 0.5; ColdZone: 0.5; }
else if (DZ_5_4_5 == ColdZone && DZ_5_5_5 == HotZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_5_6 == Low )
{ HotZone: 0.5; ColdZone: 0.5; }
else if (DZ_5_4_5 == ColdZone && DZ_5_5_5 == ColdZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_5_6 == Low )
{ HotZone: 0.4; ColdZone: 0.6; }
}

=     if (DZ_3_3_2 == HotZone && DZ_3_3_3 == HotZone )
{ HotZone: 0.8; ColdZone: 0.2; }
else if (DZ_3_3_2 == HotZone && DZ_3_3_3 == ColdZone )
{ HotZone: 0.5; ColdZone: 0.5; }
else if (DZ_3_3_2 == ColdZone && DZ_3_3_3 == HotZone )
{ HotZone: 0.5; ColdZone: 0.5; }
else if (DZ_3_3_2 == ColdZone && DZ_3_3_3 == ColdZone )
{ HotZone: 0.2; ColdZone: 0.8; }
}

{ HotZone: 0.8; ColdZone: 0.2; }
else if (DZ_5_5_4 == HotZone && DZ_5_5_5 == ColdZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_6_5 == High )
{ HotZone: 0.5; ColdZone: 0.5; }
else if (DZ_5_5_4 == ColdZone && DZ_5_5_5 == HotZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_6_5 == High )

else if (DZ_5_5_4 == HotZone && DZ_5_5_5 == HotZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_6_5 == Low )
{ HotZone: 0.6; ColdZone: 0.4; }
else if (DZ_5_5_4 == HotZone && DZ_5_5_5 == ColdZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_6_5 == Low )

else if (DZ_5_5_4 == ColdZone && DZ_5_5_5 == HotZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_6_5 == Low )
{ HotZone: 0.5; ColdZone: 0.5; }

{ HotZone: 0.4; ColdZone: 0.6; }
}

defineNode(DZ_6_6_6, des);
{defineState(Discrete, HotZone, ColdZone);
p( DZ_6_6_6 | DZ_5_5_5, Regional_Spread_Rate_6_6)
=     if (DZ_5_5_5 == HotZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_6_6 == High )
{ HotZone: 0.8; ColdZone: 0.2; }
else if (DZ_5_5_5 == ColdZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_6_6 == High )
{ HotZone: 0.2; ColdZone: 0.8; }
else if (DZ_5_5_5 == HotZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_6_6 == Low )
{ HotZone: 0.6; ColdZone: 0.4; }
else if (DZ_5_5_5 == ColdZone && Regional_Spread_Rate_6_6 == Low )
{ HotZone: 0.4; ColdZone: 0.6; }
}
 
defineNode(ReservoirPopulationSize_1_1, des);
{defineState(Discrete, AboveThreshold, BelowThreshold);
p(ReservoirPopulationSize_1_1 ) = { AboveThreshold: 0.5; BelowThreshold: 0.5; } 
}
 
defineNode(HumanPopulationSize_1_1, des);
{defineState(Discrete, AboveThreshold, BelowThreshold);
p(HumanPopulationSize_1_1 ) = { AboveThreshold: 0.5; BelowThreshold: 0.5; } 
}
 
defineNode(IsMutatedVirus_1_1, des);
{defineState(Discrete, No, Yes);
p( IsMutatedVirus_1_1 | ReservoirPopulationSize_1_1, HumanPopulationSize_1_1)
=     if (ReservoirPopulationSize_1_1 == BelowThreshold && HumanPopulationSize_1_1 == BelowThreshold )
{ No: 0.1; Yes: 0.9; }
else if (ReservoirPopulationSize_1_1 == BelowThreshold && HumanPopulationSize_1_1 == AboveThreshold )
{ No: 0.6; Yes: 0.4; }
else if (ReservoirPopulationSize_1_1 == AboveThreshold && HumanPopulationSize_1_1 == BelowThreshold )
{ No: 0.7; Yes: 0.3; }
else if (ReservoirPopulationSize_1_1 == AboveThreshold && HumanPopulationSize_1_1 == AboveThreshold )
{ No: 0.9; Yes: 0.1; }
}
 
defineNode(ReservoirPopulationSize_1_2, des);
{defineState(Discrete, AboveThreshold, BelowThreshold);
p(ReservoirPopulationSize_1_2 ) = { AboveThreshold: 0.5; BelowThreshold: 0.5; } 
}
 
defineNode(HumanPopulationSize_1_2, des);
{defineState(Discrete, AboveThreshold, BelowThreshold);
p(HumanPopulationSize_1_2 ) = { AboveThreshold: 0.5; BelowThreshold: 0.5; } 
}
 
defineNode(IsMutatedVirus_1_2, des);
{defineState(Discrete, No, Yes);
p( IsMutatedVirus_1_2 | ReservoirPopulationSize_1_2, HumanPopulationSize_1_2)
=     if (ReservoirPopulationSize_1_2 == BelowThreshold && HumanPopulationSize_1_2 == BelowThreshold )
{ No: 0.1; Yes: 0.9; }
else if (ReservoirPopulationSize_1_2 == BelowThreshold && HumanPopulationSize_1_2 == AboveThreshold )
{ No: 0.6; Yes: 0.4; }
else if (ReservoirPopulationSize_1_2 == AboveThreshold && HumanPopulationSize_1_2 == BelowThreshold )
{ No: 0.7; Yes: 0.3; }
else if (ReservoirPopulationSize_1_2 == AboveThreshold && HumanPopulationSize_1_2 == AboveThreshold )
{ No: 0.9; Yes: 0.1; }
}

{defineState(Discrete, AboveThreshold, BelowThreshold);

{ No: 0.1; Yes: 0.9; }
else if (ReservoirPopulationSize_1_3 == BelowThreshold && HumanPopulationSize_1_3 == AboveThreshold )
{ No: 0.6; Yes: 0.4; }
else if (ReservoirPopulationSize_1_3 == AboveThreshold && HumanPopulationSize_1_3 == BelowThreshold )
{ No: 0.7; Yes: 0.3; }
else if (ReservoirPopulationSize_1_3 == AboveThreshold && HumanPopulationSize_1_3 == AboveThreshold )
{ No: 0.9; Yes: 0.1; }
}
